EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-02-06 MS EoS.ES-20190205-Invite 1.Whole Emails Test
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Tomorrow?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-ms-eos/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRNgAAM]]>
Register & Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-ms-eos/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRNgAAM]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, The shift towards cloud and the looming end of support for Windows and SQL Server 2008 have IT pros weighing their options. How will you ensure you and your team take the best approach to modernize your stack?
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-ms-eos/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRNgAAM]]>
Join the Prepare for End of Support: Windows and SQL Server 2008 <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-ms-eos/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRNgAAM]]> webinar tomorrow, February 6th at 11 am ET, where our team of Microsoft experts will discuss your options and share best practices for remaining on-premise, re-platforming, or migrating to Azure.
Register now and enter to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card. Hope to see you there!
Thanks, Andrew
PS. If you can't attend, register anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-ms-eos/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRNgAAM]]> and we will send you the recording afterward.
